title: Group Value Module File Entry
description: A group value is a single, disctinct name in a group.  For each group, there can exist at most 1 group value with that name.  Group values can include a mapping of "how much" this group value maps onto other group values within the same owning group.  Additionally, each group value has a path reference, which refers to the owning value (one specific example is in roles, where a role references a collection of child attributes).
